<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Deploy a cage"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/{cageId}/deploy"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deploys a cage defined in a collaboration space.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"cageId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Id of the collaboration space"},{"in":"query","name":"keep_data","schema":{"type":"boolean","default":true},"required":false,"description":"Keep the data associated with this cage."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Settings for the cage to be deployed","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"app_id":{"type":"string"},"client_id":{"type":"string"},"dv_token":{"type":"string"},"cagepool":{"type":"string"},"environments":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}}}},"algo":{"type":"object","properties":{"cron":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["expression","type"],"properties":{"expression":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string"}}}},"source":{"type":"object","properties":{"registry":{"type":"string"},"image":{"type":"string"},"tag":{"type":"string"},"secret":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"title":"CageSettings"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Succesfully deployed cage"},"422":{"description":"Could not process the cage deployment request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Represents error object","type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["message"],"title":"422Error"}}}},"default":{"description":"General Error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Represents error object","type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["message"],"title":"500Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
